description:
Robo Warrior
The story of a robo warrior who fights an invisible enemy who is predicted to come to rule the world civilization and turn humans into evil. They began to gather strength to prepare against the enemy.

robowarrior//212
weapon : Ax
power : 3/5
defence : 3/5
soul : 2/5

story :
A war veteran trapped in the wilderness, who finds strength when he eats the roots of the plant of life. Trained by a magical madman in a cave above the clouds.
